message: Initializing QA framework design - analyzing current system architecture and identifying testing requirements
Analyzed current system architecture and data collection module - designing comprehensive QA framework strategy
Deployed 2 specialized child agents (security_testing_specialist, architecture_testing_specialist) - analyzing existing test infrastructure
Analyzing comprehensive findings from 16 agents - designing comprehensive QA framework addressing critical security, data integrity, and performance issues

MISSION COMPLETE: Comprehensive QA framework delivered addressing all critical vulnerabilities. Framework includes 4-tier testing architecture, automation pipeline, and coordination with 16 specialist agents
